name: test_e2e_with_logs[274_PATH_ENC_ADV_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_ENC_ADV_001` |
| **Name** | UTF-8 overlong dot encoding traversal |
| **Category** | PATH_TRAVERSAL |
| **Subcategory** | advanced_encoding |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `%c0%ae%c0%ae/etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%c0%ae%c0%ae%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~71000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:10:48.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Traversal] Encoded path traversal attack detected test_id=PATH_ENC_ADV_001-1772277048495-zzcrv pattern_id=PATH_ENC_ADV_001 uri=/?q=%c0%ae%c0%ae%2Fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
